title: Sana
text: We waste too much working time searching for information, navigating between tools, and repeating manual tasks. Our AI assistant integrates with all your companyâ€™s apps so employees can search, chat, and automate their way to a more fulfilling and effective working life.Sana's end-to-end learning platform helps companies centralize all their knowledge, automate and scale training initiatives, and increase engagement through learning experiences that are relevant, interactive, and collaborative.
